Title: Token expired
Resolution: Refresh session or sign in again

Title: MFA required
Resolution: Enroll MFA or use recovery codes

Title: Permission denied
Message: You lack required permission for this action

Title: User not assigned to TMC
Message: No TMC membership for selected workflow

Title: Policy not assigned
Message: No travel policy for this user or org

Title: Contract missing
Resolution: Set up contract or pick another vendor

Title: Payment declined
Resolution: Try another card or contact bank

Title: Rate unavailable
Resolution: Retry later or set fixed corporate rate

Title: eSIM package unavailable
Message: Selected eSIM not available for region

Title: PNR creation failed
Message: Could not create PNR with GDS

Title: Itinerary sync failed
Message: Failed to sync itinerary to profile

Title: Search timeout
Message: Supplier search did not return in time

Title: Upload failed
Resolution: Retry with smaller or supported file

Title: Forbidden
Message: Not allowed to access this resource

Title: Environment mismatch
Message: Feature not enabled in this environment

Title: Cache unavailable
Resolution: Fail over to DB or retry
